column5: Hi, I'm planning to go to Air Melancon Moselle again this year. I went last year and targeted brook trout. I truly enjoyed my stay there. This year, we want to return and would like to try a lake that contains both walleye and lake trout. Sand and Ducarney lakes seems to offer what we are looking for. I was told that sand lake can be very difficult depending on weather. I heard Ducarney is good for walleye, but unsure about lake trout. Anyone has fished these lakes? Any advice? Thanks
We went early June. Fishing was very good. Good number of 12''-14'' trouts.
